items: Alt Accounts â†ª Max 2 accounts online at once. AFK-related punishments apply to all accounts.
Bypassing Punishments â†ª Using alts to evade mutes, bans, or restrictions is not allowed.
Botting â†ª Controlling many accounts for automation/spam/mining/farming is not allowed.
Printers â†ª Printer mods/programs are not allowed. Schematica/Litematica are allowed.
Exploits / Gameplay Bugs â†ª Do not abuse bugs or unintended mechanics for advantage.
Association â†ª Associating with cheaters may result in punishment.
Teleport Trapping â†ª No trapping/killing players via teleports (lava boxes, kill chambers, inescapable cages, etc.).
Idle AFK / AutoClick AFK â†ª No idle AFKing or autoclicking to farm/mine/collect resources while away.

title: ğŸ¤ Trading Guidelines
items: A trade is only considered IRL if it involves real-life currency (USD, Euros, etc.).
All IRL trades MUST be made within the official JartonMC store (gift cards, gifted coins, etc.).
Any IRL trading outside of the JartonMC store will result in a permanent ban.
Scamming â†ª IRL trade scamming results in a permanent ban AND full compensation for the victim.
